text: Great experience in a well organized tour which fulfilled all our expectactions.
name: Lois G.

text: Very well organized, informative, would highly recommend as it's a great way to see Iceland.
name: Alan D.

text: The best Holiday in my life, Thanks Compass, we will repeat with you!
name: Tony N.

text: A nice variety of tours to choose from. Easy to book online. Extremely responsive customer service. If visiting the Land of Fire and Ice is on your wish list, Iceland Tours can definitely help you fulfill you wish!
name: Cindy L.

text: Seamless travel with fantastic accommodations and great recommendations. Our family had an amazing trip.
name: Sonja S.

text: Rápidos, eficaces, todos los bonos, reservas, etc. exactos y sin ningún problema, da mucha tranquilidad.
name: José J.

text: They are wonderful. Booking your trip through them will never let you down. I scheduled an 8-day self-drive trip and had no problems. They are excellent communicators.
name: Chiral S.
